hero.title: Software Engineer specializing in .NET backend systems.
hero.subtitle:
I build .NET backend systems and AI-integrated products, focusing on designing backend services and APIs for production environments. My work involves contributing to architectural decisions and developing systems with an emphasis on reliability, scalability, and long-term maintainability.

I previously worked as a Software Engineering Intern at SunExpress Airlines (a joint venture of Lufthansa and Turkish Airlines), contributing to enterprise-scale internal applications within the Business Airline Solutions team.

beyond_engineering.title: Beyond Engineering
beyond_engineering.subtitle: While engineering is my primary area of expertise, my professional perspective has been shaped over the years by experience beyond software development. My background in financial markets, entrepreneurship, and professional sports has directly influenced how I approach risk, responsibility, and discipline, and has informed the way I make decisions in my engineering work.

markets.title: Financial Markets & Trading
markets.description:
I have been actively trading in forex markets, cryptocurrencies, and equities for over six years. My approach is primarily based on price action and smart money concepts.
This experience has strengthened my ability to make decisions under uncertainty, manage risk, and think systematically.
markets.impact: The perspective I developed in financial markets directly influences how I evaluate probabilities, risks, and long-term implications in engineering projects.

entrepreneurship.title: Entrepreneurship
entrepreneurship.description: During my university years, I founded my first venture, an e-commerce initiative called LLUX. This experience provided an end-to-end perspective, from planning and execution to problem-solving and taking full ownership of outcomes.
entrepreneurship.impact: The entrepreneurial process strengthened my approach to ownership, prioritization, and results-driven execution in software engineering projects.

athlete.title: Athletic Background
athlete.description: I competed for many years as a licensed professional kickboxer. This experience played a significant role in developing discipline, consistency, and the ability to perform under pressure.
athlete.impact: These habits continue to support my approach to complex engineering projects, particularly in maintaining long-term stability, accountability, and sustainable performance.

sunexpress.title: Software Engineering Intern
sunexpress.subtitle: Joint venture of Lufthansa and Turkish Airlines
sunexpress.description:
I worked within the Business Airline Solutions team on the development of product-oriented, internal systems. During this period, I contributed to backend-focused development activities for enterprise-scale applications used across the organization.

As part of my role, I developed backend services and APIs using .NET Web API, and worked on database design and data access processes with MSSQL. I also contributed to integrations with internal and external systems, supporting backend workflows involving asynchronous processing and messaging.

I actively participated in sprint-based development processes conducted under Agile/Scrum methodologies, taking part in planning, development, and delivery phases. Throughout the development lifecycle, I worked with technologies including .NET Web API, React, React Native, and MSSQL, and used Azure DevOps for version control, task tracking, and team collaboration.

llux.title: Founder
llux.subtitle: E-commerce Initiative
llux.description:
LLUX is an e-commerce venture that I founded and managed independently during my university years. I operated in the small home appliances category, running sales through both my own e-commerce platform and online marketplaces.

Throughout this period, I took full responsibility for the venture, covering areas ranging from product selection and positioning to supplier relationships, operational management, and coordination of sales channels. I was actively involved in planning daily operations, overseeing order processes, and managing the overall customer experience.

bahcesehir.title: Technical Analyst & Editor
bahcesehir.subtitle: Financial Research Center
bahcesehir.description:
I worked as a Technical Analyst and Editor at the Bahçeşehir University Financial Research Center (BFRC), contributing to the preparation of a weekly financial bulletin published on a regular basis. The bulletin covered a wide range of topics, including the U.S. and global economy, Turkish markets, commodities, cryptocurrencies, and various macroeconomic subjects, along with technical analyses.

In my role as a Technical Analyst, I conducted market analyses across forex, cryptocurrency, and equity markets. I primarily applied price action and smart money concepts approaches, producing technical analyses, charts, and market commentaries, and contributing regularly to the published bulletin.

As an Editor, I was responsible for the pre-publication review and refinement of content. This included ensuring clarity, consistency, and quality of analyses, maintaining writing standards, and supporting the management of the weekly publication schedule. The content produced within BFRC was published regularly and made accessible both within and outside the university.

work.career_direction_text:
I aim to advance my career by combining my backend-focused full-stack development expertise with systems integrated with artificial intelligence, machine learning, and deep learning. I am currently developing backend systems using .NET Web API, Django, and FastAPI, while also building end-to-end full-stack projects and AI-integrated applications with React.

In the short to mid term, my goal is to work within teams that develop reliable and scalable software systems operating in production environments, and to specialize in domains that require high levels of reliability and engineering discipline, such as aviation, aerospace, and defense. Throughout this process, I prioritize deepening my technical expertise in the proper integration of AI-enabled systems into software architectures.

about.title: About
about.narrative:
Growing up with a strong passion for sports, discipline has always been a defining part of my life. As a licensed kickboxer with experience in multiple athletic fields, I learned early on the value of consistency, focus, and resilience — qualities that have shaped both my personal growth and my approach to engineering.

My interest in technology started at a young age and naturally evolved into a deeper commitment during university, where I immersed myself in software development. What began as curiosity quickly became a long-term pursuit, leading me toward backend engineering and modern web technologies. Over time, I gravitated toward the .NET ecosystem, scalable backend design, and the principles of clean, maintainable code. Working with technologies like ASP.NET Core, React, SQL Server, Redis, and RabbitMQ helped me build a strong engineering foundation centered around problem-solving and system reliability.

Alongside software development, I took my first step into entrepreneurship by founding LLux, an e-commerce business I launched during university. Managing product development, operations, and customer workflows gave me hands-on experience in building small real-world systems — and taught me the practical value of ownership, adaptability, and delivering results.

I also have a long-standing personal interest in financial markets. For over six years, I have been involved in trading and long-term investing as an individual investor. This experience deepened my understanding of market behavior, risk, and strategy, adding another dimension to how I analyze complex problems and make decisions.

My latest professional step was joining SunExpress Airlines within the Business Airline Solutions team, where I contributed to enterprise-level internal applications. Working in a real corporate engineering environment strengthened my understanding of scalable architecture, Agile practices, CI/CD pipelines, and teamwork in large-scale systems.

Today, I continue to focus on backend engineering with .NET, cloud-based development, and system design — while also expanding my knowledge in AI and machine learning. My goal is to combine these areas into meaningful, high-impact technological work throughout my career.
